earn(address,uint256).details: This is a dummy function to allow the MetaVault to call

params._expected: The expected amount to deposit after conversion

recoverUnsupportedToken(address,address).details: This only allows the strategist to recover unsupported tokens

params._receiver: The address to receive the tokens

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of the given token on the vault

legacyDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposits the given token to the v3 vault

recoverUnsupportedToken(address,address).notice: Recovers stuck tokens sent directly to this contract

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws the amount from the v3 vault

withdrawFee(address,uint256).notice: Returns the withdraw fee for withdrawing the given token and amount
